sentence.Network_en: The ballerina remained suspended in a faultless arabesque.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位芭蕾舞女演员一直保持着完美的阿拉贝斯克舞姿不动。

sentence.Network_en: When I was eight years old, my parents were faultless gods.
sentence.Network_cn: 八岁时, 我视父母为完美无缺的崇拜偶像.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级高频词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... fastener n． 扣件，钮扣，揿钮 faultless a． 无过失的；无缺点的 fearless a． 无畏的，大胆的.
有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... fatless 无脂肪的 faultless 完美无缺的 fearless 无畏的.
faultily 不完美地faultless 无错误的-
faultiness 有故障有瑕疵faultless 无过失的Faults Separated 过失中断

list.abs: without a fault ; in a faultless manner ., 没有错误 ; 以无可指责的方式.
The dancers gave an absolutely faultless performance ., 舞蹈家们作了一次完美无瑕的表演.
fault tolerance 失效容差faultless mask 无缺陷掩模fax 传真
fault-tolerant computer 容错计算机faultless cloth 正品布Faun 福恩牌汽车

entry.tran: 无可挑剔的;完美无缺的
entry.def: Something that is faultless is perfect and has no mistakes at all.

example.ex: ...Mary Thomson's faultless and impressive performance on the show...
example.tran: 玛丽·汤姆森在演出中令人印象深刻的完美表现

auth_sentence.content: He perceived excellence instantly and had a faultless eye.
auth_sentence.res_content: He perceived excellence instantly and had a faultless eye.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He perceived excellence instantly and had a faultless eye.

auth_sentence.content: Her French accent was perfect, her diction faultless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her French accent was perfect, her diction faultless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her French accent was perfect, her diction faultless.

auth_sentence.content: The western heavens were their brightest possible faultless blue.
auth_sentence.res_content: The western heavens were their brightest possible faultless blue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The western heavens were their brightest possible faultless blue.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rest休息,静止+less无……的,不……的→adj.得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sense感觉+less无……的,不……的→adj.不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
spine脊骨,书脊+less无……的,不……的→没骨气的
tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的

sentences.en: When I was eight years old,my parents were faultless gods.
sentences.cn: 八岁时,我视父母为完美无缺的崇拜偶像。

sentences.en: He is lifeless that is faultless.
Her carriage and diction were always faultless.
sentences.cn: 她的风度举止、遣词用字总是无可挑剔。
